content:
I do not have information that specific, but i was able to search and find the general academic courses that are typically offered in a political science major at georgetown university:

1. introduction to political theory 
2. international relations 
3. comparative politics 
4. american politics 
5. political science research methods 
6. public policy 
7. political philosophy 
8. race, ethnicity, and politics 
9. the presidency 
10. congress 
11. political participation 
12. political parties and elections 
13. political and social movements 
14. political violence and terrorism 
15. constitutional law 
16. civil liberties 
17. international law and organizations 
18. political economy 
19. feminist political theory 
20. global governance 

additionally, georgetown university offers several special topics courses on various political issues, and students have the opportunity to conduct research and write papers in political science.
